doc:
Simon Russell Beale https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simon_Russell_Beale 0 Simon Russell Beale, CBE (born 12 January 1961) is an English actor, author and music historian. Beale has been described by The Independent as "the greatest stage actor of his generation." He has appeared in Persuasion (1995), The Young Visiters (2003), Dunkirk (2004), The Deep Blue Sea (2011) and as Falstaff in the BBC made-for-television films Henry IV, Part I and Part II (2012). He was part of the main cast of Showtime's Penny Dreadful. More recently, he has appeared in Into the Woods and The Death of Stalin. Simon_Russell_Beale , CBE ( born 12_January_1961 ) is an_English_actor_,_author_and_music_historian . Beale has_been_described by The_Independent as " the_greatest_stage_actor of his_generation . " He has_appeared in Persuasion_(_1995_) , The_Young_Visiters_(_2003_) , Dunkirk_(_2004_) , The_Deep_Blue_Sea_(_2011_) and as Falstaff in the_BBC_made-for-television_films Henry_IV , Part_I and Part_II ( 2012_) . He was part of the_main_cast of Showtime 's_Penny_Dreadful . More_recently , he has_appeared in Into the_Woods and The_Death of Stalin .
